text: Manimuthar is the name of four different rivers in Tamil Nadu, India: * Manimuthar River (tributary of Thamirabarani) * Manimuthar River (tributary of Vellar), a river in Tamil Nadu, India * Thirumanimuthar River (tributary of Kaveri), a river in Tamil Nadu, India * Manimuthar River (tributary of Pambar), a river in Tamil Nadu, India
title: Manimuthar River
